title: Anirudh sings a song under simbu music for Santhanam Vaibhavi Sakka Podu Podu raja - Tamil Movie News
text: Nagesh - The Champion of Actors In last week's release horror-comedy flick 'Rum' multi-talented star Silambrasan had sung a song under Anirudh Ravichander's music score. Now its time for a role reversal between the two thick friends. We all know that Simbu will be making his debut as a music composer with the Santhanam starrer 'Sakka Podu Podu Raja'. Now it has been revealed that Anirudh has crooned a song in this film under Simbu's music. The 'Vallavan' actor confirmed the same in his Twitter page and release a video taken during the recording of the song with Ani's voice. 'Sakka Podu Podu Raja' stars Santhanam and Vaibhavi Sandilya in lead roles. The film will be directed by Sethuraman and produced by VTV Productions of actor VTV Ganesh. What a changeover !!! I'm recording and @anirudhofficial is singing .Thanks ani :) #SakkaPoduPoduRaja @iamsanthanam pic.twitter.com/BNsnhFHdBY
